title: E58 Religion
itunes:title: Religion
description:
In this episode, the team discusses religion with renowned writer, commentator, professor, Emmy-nominated producer, and scholar of religions, Reza Aslan.

Follow Reza on Instagram and Twitter @RezaAslan.

The Metaphysical Milkshake Podcast is out NOW with Reza and Rainn Wilson. Be sure to check them out on Youtube and wherever you listen to podcasts and follow them on Instagram @MetaphysicalMilkshake.

Go to JimJefferies.com to buy tickets to Jim's upcoming tour, The Moist Tour.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
